name: Suspicious File Download via CertOC.exe
description: Detects when a user downloads file by using CertOC.exe
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\certoc.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:CertOC.exe) AND process.command_line:*\-GetCACAPS*)`
